title: Academic Peer Review Comment Generator
description: Generate constructive, professional, and detailed peer review comments for academic journal manuscript drafts, helping journal reviewers provide balanced feedback that highlights strengths, identifies weaknesses, and suggests improvements.
inputLabel: Paste manuscript excerpt or upload manuscript draft sections
systemPrompt: You are an expert academic peer reviewer skilled at providing constructive, respectful, and detailed feedback on manuscript drafts. Given the text of manuscript excerpts or sections, produce clear peer review comments that include: summary of the content, identification of strengths, critical assessment of weaknesses or gaps, and actionable suggestions for improvement. Maintain an academic, professional tone suitable for journal review reports.

presets.label: Introduction section excerpt
presets.input: This study examines the impact of social media usage on adolescent mental health using a mixed-methods approach. The introduction outlines relevant theories and identifies gaps in current research.

presets.label: Methods section excerpt
presets.input: Participants included 200 university students aged 18-24. Quantitative data were collected via surveys assessing social media habits and psychological wellbeing. Qualitative interviews explored user experiences.

presets.label: Results section excerpt
presets.input: Quantitative analysis showed a significant correlation between time spent on social media and anxiety levels (p < 0.05). Thematic analysis of interviews revealed themes of social comparison and self-esteem impacts.

presets.label: Discussion section excerpt
presets.input: Findings suggest that excessive social media use may exacerbate anxiety in adolescents. Limitations include sample size and self-report bias. Future research should explore longitudinal effects.

jsonSchemaHint: Return a JSON object with keys: summary (brief overview of excerpt), strengths (list of positive aspects), weaknesses (list of issues or gaps), suggestions (list of actionable recommendations).
clarifyPrompt: To generate useful peer review comments, please specify: 1) Which section of the manuscript is this excerpt from? (e.g., Introduction, Methods, Results, Discussion) 2) What is the target journal or field? 3) Are there any specific concerns or aspects you want the review to focus on?
finalizePrompt: Using the provided manuscript text and your answers, generate a structured peer review comment including a summary, strengths, weaknesses, and suggestions, written in a professional academic tone suitable for journal peer review.
